description: Kotlin Multiplatform SDK for in-app customer support chat with offline support, real-time messaging, and push notifications

tasks.title: Project scaffolding & Gradle setup
tasks.description:
Set up the KMP SDK module structure with Gradle configuration.

**What to do:**
- Create sdk module with commonMain, androidMain, iosMain source sets
- Configure Gradle with KMP plugin, targets (Android SDK 28+, iOS 15+)
- Add core dependencies: Kotlin Stdlib, Kotlinx Coroutines, Kotlinx Serialization, Ktor Client, SQLDelight, Kotlinx DateTime
- Set up package structure: dev.replyhq.sdk with config/, ui/, data/, core/, platform/ directories

**Acceptance criteria:**
- ./gradlew :sdk:build compiles without errors
- Source sets are properly configured for common, Android, and iOS

tasks.title: Platform expect/actual declarations
tasks.description:
Create platform abstraction layer with expect/actual declarations.

**What to do:**
- Create platform/Platform.kt with expect val platformName: String
- Create platform/Connectivity.kt with expect class for network monitoring
- Create platform/PushNotifications.kt with expect class for FCM/APNs
- Create platform/Preferences.kt with expect class for SharedPreferences/NSUserDefaults
- Implement actual declarations for Android and iOS

**Files:**
- sdk/src/commonMain/kotlin/dev/replyhq/sdk/platform/
- sdk/src/androidMain/kotlin/dev/replyhq/sdk/platform/
- sdk/src/iosMain/kotlin/dev/replyhq/sdk/platform/

**Acceptance criteria:**
- ./gradlew :sdk:build passes
- Platform.name returns 'android' or 'ios' correctly

tasks.title: Configuration data classes
tasks.description:
Create all configuration container classes.

**What to do:**
- Create config/ChatConfig.kt - main config container
- Create config/ChatUser.kt - user identification (id, name, email, attributes)
- Create config/ChatTheme.kt - appearance (accentColor, bubblePosition, darkMode)
- Create config/ChatBehavior.kt - runtime behavior (showBubble, enableOfflineQueue, maxOfflineMessages, attachmentsEnabled, typingIndicators)
- Create config/NetworkConfig.kt - timeout, retryPolicy, maxRetries

**Acceptance criteria:**
- All data classes compile
- Default values match PRD spec

tasks.title: Data models - Conversation & Message
tasks.description:
Create core data model entities.

**What to do:**
- Create data/models/Conversation.kt with id, userId, createdAt, updatedAt, metadata
- Create data/models/Message.kt with id, localId, conversationId, content, senderType (USER/AGENT/SYSTEM), sentAt, status (QUEUED/SENDING/SENT/DELIVERED/READ/FAILED)
- Create data/models/DeviceContext.kt with platform, osVersion, appVersion, deviceModel, locale, timezone

**Acceptance criteria:**
- Models use kotlinx.serialization annotations
- ./gradlew :sdk:build passes

tasks.title: SQLDelight database schema
tasks.description:
Set up local persistence with SQLDelight.

**What to do:**
- Create SQLDelight schema files for Conversation and Message tables
- Add queries: insertMessage, getMessagesByConversation, getQueuedMessages, updateMessageStatus
- Create data/local/ChatDatabase.kt wrapper
- Create data/local/MessageQueue.kt for offline queue operations
- Create data/local/Preferences.kt for SDK state storage

**Acceptance criteria:**
- SQLDelight generates type-safe code
- ./gradlew :sdk:build passes
- Can insert and query messages

tasks.title: Ktor HTTP client - ChatApi
tasks.description:
Implement REST API client.

**What to do:**
- Create data/remote/ChatApi.kt with Ktor HttpClient
- Implement endpoints:
  - POST /conversations - get or create conversation
  - POST /conversations/:id/messages - send message
  - GET /conversations/:id/messages?after=<ts> - fetch messages
  - POST /push-token - register push token
- Add headers: X-App-Id, X-Device-Id, X-SDK-Version, Content-Type
- Base URL: https://api.replyhq.dev/v1

**Acceptance criteria:**
- API client compiles
- Request/response DTOs use kotlinx.serialization

tasks.title: WebSocket realtime client
tasks.description:
Implement WebSocket handler for real-time messaging.

**What to do:**
- Create data/remote/RealtimeClient.kt with Ktor WebSocket
- Connect to wss://api.replyhq.dev/v1/realtime?app_id=xxx&device_id=xxx
- Handle server events: message.new, agent.typing
- Send client events: user.typing, ping
- Implement heartbeat ping every 30s

**Acceptance criteria:**
- WebSocket connects and receives messages
- Exposes Flow<RealtimeEvent> for consumers

tasks.title: ConnectionManager state machine
tasks.description:
Implement connection lifecycle management.

**What to do:**
- Create core/ConnectionManager.kt with states: DISCONNECTED, CONNECTING, CONNECTED, RECONNECTING
- Implement connect(), disconnect(), pause(), resume() methods
- Add exponential backoff reconnection: 1s → 2s → 4s → 8s → max 30s
- Listen to platform Connectivity for network changes

**Acceptance criteria:**
- State transitions are correct
- Auto-reconnect on network restore

tasks.title: SyncManager offline sync
tasks.description:
Implement offline message synchronization.

**What to do:**
- Create core/SyncManager.kt
- On network restore: fetch queued messages, send oldest first
- Update message state: QUEUED → SENDING → SENT or FAILED
- Max 3 retries per message before FAILED
- On reconnect: fetch missed messages from server

**Acceptance criteria:**
- Messages sent offline sync when online
- No duplicates (server dedupes by local_id)

tasks.title: SessionManager lifecycle
tasks.description:
Implement session and user management.

**What to do:**
- Create core/SessionManager.kt
- Generate and persist device_id (UUID v4) on first launch
- Handle setUser() - starts/continues conversation
- Handle clearUser() - ends session
- Auto-detect app foreground/background

**Acceptance criteria:**
- Device ID persists across launches
- User changes trigger new conversation

tasks.title: DeviceContextCollector
tasks.description:
Implement device metadata collection.

**What to do:**
- Create core/DeviceContextCollector.kt
- Collect: platform, osVersion, appVersion, deviceModel, locale, timezone
- Use expect/actual for platform-specific collection

**Acceptance criteria:**
- Returns valid DeviceContext on both platforms

tasks.title: ChatSDK main entry point
tasks.description:
Create the main SDK singleton with public API.

**What to do:**
- Create ChatSDK.kt as object singleton
- Implement init(context, appId) minimal version
- Implement init(context, config) full version
- Implement setUser(), clearUser()
- Implement open(), close()
- Expose unreadCount: StateFlow<Int>
- Implement onAppForegrounded(), onAppBackgrounded()
- Implement reset() for debug

**Acceptance criteria:**
- Public API matches PRD spec
- Fail fast on missing appId

tasks.title: Chat theme system
tasks.description:
Implement theming for chat UI.

**What to do:**
- Create ui/theme/ChatTheme.kt with Compose theming
- Support accentColor, darkMode (LIGHT/DARK/SYSTEM)
- Create color scheme for message bubbles, backgrounds, text

**Acceptance criteria:**
- Theme applies to all UI components
- Dark mode works correctly

tasks.title: MessageBubble component
tasks.description:
Create individual message rendering component.

**What to do:**
- Create ui/components/MessageBubble.kt
- Different styles for USER vs AGENT messages
- Show timestamp, delivery status indicators
- Handle long text wrapping
- Show 'sending' indicator for QUEUED/SENDING
- Show 'tap to retry' for FAILED

**Acceptance criteria:**
- Messages display correctly
- Status indicators visible

tasks.title: MessageList component
tasks.description:
Create scrollable message list.

**What to do:**
- Create ui/components/MessageList.kt
- LazyColumn with MessageBubble items
- Auto-scroll to bottom on new message
- Support pull-to-refresh for older messages

**Acceptance criteria:**
- Scrolls smoothly
- New messages appear at bottom

tasks.title: InputBar component
tasks.description:
Create text input with send button.

**What to do:**
- Create ui/components/InputBar.kt
- Text field with send button
- Disable send for empty text
- Client-side validation: 5000 char limit
- Rate limit: 5 msgs/second

**Acceptance criteria:**
- Can type and send messages
- Validation prevents invalid sends

tasks.title: TypingIndicator component
tasks.description:
Create agent typing animation.

**What to do:**
- Create ui/components/TypingIndicator.kt
- Animated dots when agent is typing
- Show/hide based on realtime events

**Acceptance criteria:**
- Animation plays smoothly
- Appears when agent.typing event received

tasks.title: ConnectionStatus component
tasks.description:
Create online/offline indicator.

**What to do:**
- Create ui/components/ConnectionStatus.kt
- Show banner when offline
- Show reconnecting state
- Hide when connected

**Acceptance criteria:**
- Correctly reflects ConnectionManager state

tasks.title: ChatScreen full interface
tasks.description:
Assemble full chat screen from components.

**What to do:**
- Create ui/ChatScreen.kt composable
- Combine: ConnectionStatus, MessageList, TypingIndicator, InputBar
- Wire to ChatSDK for data and actions
- Handle keyboard properly (doesn't cover input)
- Support onDismiss callback

**Acceptance criteria:**
- Full chat experience works
- Keyboard behavior correct

tasks.title: ChatBubble FAB component
tasks.description:
Create floating action button.

**What to do:**
- Create ui/ChatBubble.kt composable
- Show unread badge from ChatSDK.unreadCount
- Support bubblePosition (BOTTOM_LEFT, BOTTOM_RIGHT)
- Tap opens ChatScreen

**Acceptance criteria:**
- FAB displays correctly
- Unread count shows
- Opens chat on tap

tasks.title: Push notification token registration
tasks.description:
Implement push token management.

**What to do:**
- Create data/remote/PushTokenManager.kt
- On token refresh: POST to /push-token
- Android: integrate with Firebase Messaging
- iOS: integrate with APNs

**Acceptance criteria:**
- Token registered with server
- Works on both platforms

tasks.title: Push notification handling
tasks.description:
Handle incoming push notifications.

**What to do:**
- Parse push payload for new messages
- Android: show notification, tap opens chat
- iOS: show notification, tap opens chat
- Update unread count

**Acceptance criteria:**
- Notifications display when app backgrounded
- Tap opens chat screen

tasks.title: iOS SwiftUI wrapper
tasks.description:

- Create Swift wrapper ReplyHQChatView

**Acceptance criteria:**
- SwiftUI app can import and use ReplyHQChatView
- All SDK methods accessible from Swift

tasks.title: Error handling & edge cases
tasks.description:
Implement comprehensive error handling.

**What to do:**
- Handle: app killed mid-send, duplicate sends, token expired (401)
- Handle: server down, WebSocket dies, user reinstalls
- Handle: user switches account, message too long, rapid messages
- Handle: no app_id (throw on init), invalid app_id (403)
- All errors gracefully logged, no crashes

**Acceptance criteria:**
- All error scenarios handled per PRD table
- Crash-free rate target: >99.9%
